DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the acceptability and feasibility of an enhanced, individual-level counseling intervention for individuals in the acute and early phase of HIV infection aimed at reducing risk behaviors.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility and Acceptability Study of an Individual-Level Behavioral Intervention for Individuals With Acute and Early HIV-Infection
